title: MDMY Group
metaDescription: Global E-Commerce Excellence with French Savoir-Faire
tagline: Global E-Commerce Excellence with French Savoir-Faire
missionText: Meet our team of four dynamic entrepreneurs, educated in France, fueled by a common vision of success and impact. With excellence and innovation at our core, we are on a journey to build long-lasting businesses that not only excel but also leave a positive mark on the world. As a close-knit group, our team capitalizes on diverse talents, embracing challenges with a spirit of collaboration.

teamMembers.description: IAE Paris-Est School of Management Master’s graduate specialized in Financial Engineering. Experienced Corporate Affairs Manager eager to leverage financial best practices to mitigate financial risk and unleash businesses profitability.

SKEMA Business School Master’s graduate specialized in Digital Marketing & Data Analytics. Acquired in-depth knowledge and proficiency in implementing digital strategies for acquisition and customer relationship management.

Montpellier Business School Master’s graduate specialized in Sales Strategy. Result oriented and strongly experienced in sales development. Equipped with sharp analytical skills and a proven ability to maximize revenue growth.

Ivey Business School Master's graduate and University of Technology of Troyes Engineer specialized in Management Consulting & Computer Science. Passionate about leveraging technology and analytics to enhance business decision.

ctaText: Connect with our team to explore collaboration opportunities.
